modName: You Better Run - Bigger trolls and giants
summary: Makes dragons, giants, and trolls bigger and a tad stronger.
descriptionHtml:
Makes dragons, giants, and trolls bigger and stronger.
They\'re not ultra-hard, but not recommended for low leveled players.
If you find any issues or if they\'re still too weak for you, please leave your comment and I\'ll see what I can do.

Change log
V1.1c patch
- Mammoths size slightly reduced.

V1.1b patch
- Dragons are back to normal size, untill I can fix the bug. They\'re still stronger.

V1.1a patch (Buggy)
- Mammoths are now bigger.
- Added new type of troll (The Elder Troll) Bigger and much stronger.
- Added custom textures for trolls.

*Installation*
Extract everything to skyrim data folder.
(Texture and Elder Troll are optional, delete them if you don\'t want to use them).
author: Godric
